The photo was published on Facebook on N: 2019, showing an injured man with severe burns.
The traditional Chinese: language caption of the post translates to English as a description of a police officer from an armored car that caught fire during the incident.
The photo was published on the same day: 4. A reverse image search revealed that the photo had circulated online since at least 2018 in Malaysian media reports about a man who was attacked in Malaysia.
